Color Factory - NYC Interactive Art Museum

adrFormatAddress: 251 Spring St, New York, NY 10013, USA

editorialSummary.text: Art exhibit centered on colors, featuring playful participatory installations in separate rooms.

originalText.text:
Visiting the Color Factory in NYC was an absolute delight! My daughter had an amazing time, and seeing our out-of-state guests thoroughly enjoy themselves made our decision to choose this interactive art museum incredibly rewarding. The experience catered to all ages and was genuinely fun-filled.

The customer service was exceptional, deserving not just 5 stars but 100 stars for their attentiveness and friendliness. The staff truly made our visit memorable.

Every room and game offered a unique and enjoyable experience. From start to finish, we were captivated by the creativity and engaging activities throughout. It’s a must-visit for anyone seeking a joyful and immersive art adventure!

The customer service was exceptional, deserving not just 5 stars but 100 stars for their attentiveness and friendliness. The staff truly made our visit memorable.

Every room and game offered a unique and enjoyable experience. From start to finish, we were captivated by the creativity and engaging activities throughout. It’s a must-visit for anyone seeking a joyful and immersive art adventure!

originalText.text:
What a cool place! Much more of an interactive museum and reading but still fun! It’s interactive for mainly kids but it can be for adults as well! You get sweet treats along the way which is a plus. You can go at your own pace throughout the museum which was nice. All of the employees were so nice and friendly! I also loved how they had a camera system where they take photos for you in every room and send the pictures to your email for free.

Felt like it was overpriced for what it offered though. I thought there was going to be more offered in the museum. It’s more small than you think and it can easily be completed in an hour to hour and thirty minutes. Overall, a fun time!

originalText.text:
An absolute blast! My friends and I stopped by one evening after work, and really loved our time here.

Fun rooms with activity and photo spots. You also can’t pass up on free treats along the way. The ball pit was also fun for all ages.

I will definitely go back with my significant other sometime.

originalText.text: I was searching things to do as a family in NYC and spotted this attraction. I was very excited to go, especially seeing all the reviews and pictures online. The whole family had a blast. Every room was very interactive and entertaining. Certain rooms are more fun then others, but they are all super creative. The ball pit was definitely the kids favorite. I would definitely go back if ever in NYC or another city that has the color factory available.

originalText.text: It is so much fun and full of surprises and candies! Yess! We also got ice cream and some gifts. I recommend for adults and kids both it was fun with my friends
